column2: It's not who I am underneath. But what I do that defines me.
Courage, dear heart.
Look at the stars and not at your feet. Be curious.
May my heart be kind, my mind fierce, and my spirit brave.
No matter what anybody tells you, words and ideas can change the world.
Peace cannot be kept by force; It can only be achieved by understanding.
In three words I can sum up everything I have learned about life: 'It Goes On'
You are not entitled to your opinion. You are entitled to your informed opinion. No one is entitled to be ignorant.
The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of the child into old age, which means never losing your enthusiasm.
Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart.
When you see a person without a smile, give them one of yours.
In order to move forward we have to leave behind our old way of thinking.
Be yourself. Everyone else is already taken.
Change is the essence of life; be willing to surrender what you are for what you could become.
You can feel sore tomorrow or you can feel sorry tomorrow. You choose.
When I was able to get down the road a ways and look back, I realized success is 90% perseverance. The key is to stay in the game.
Whatever you are, be a good one.
If you dream it, you can do it.
Never, never, never give up.
Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
If not us, who? If not now, when?
Everything you can imagine is real.
I can, therefore I am.
Remember no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
Hope is a waking dream.
Action is the foundational key to all success.
Do one thing every day that scares you.
You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
Don’t regret the past, just learn from it.
Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
Live what you love.
The power of imagination makes us infinite.
Eighty percent of success is showing up.
To be the best, you must be able to handle the worst.
A jug fills drop by drop.
The best way out is always through.
If you have never failed you have never lived.
Hope is the heartbeat of the soul.
Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
All you need is love.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
We become what we think about.
An obstacle is often a stepping stone.
Dream big and dare to fail.
Men are born to succeed, not fail.
May you live every day of your life.
